"Destroy the runaway cars!": "Destroy the runaway cars within the time limit!"
"Destroy the runaway cars within the time limit!"

"Some cars have formed from Ether
and they're running amok! Use the
dash panels to catch up to them
and get rid of them sharpish!"

"Looks like the Ether forming those
Phantom cars has dispersed! Thanks!"

"Those Phantom cars could
have gone anywhere. Hopefully
nothing will come of it...
Well, anyway, you can
return to your mission."

"There's certainly fewer of those
Phantom cars around now!
You're doing great!"

"There's hardly any Phantom cars
left! Don't let up on the gas now!"
